entry.title: The Three Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Three Musketeers, 1973 ⭐️ ★★★½ Richard Lester’s take stands out for something else: its sense of fun and camaraderie . the first part leans heavily on action, and when they are done with humor and flair, it’s pure delight . 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-three-musketeers-1973/1/ #FilmReview

entry.title: The Four Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Four Musketeers, 1974 ⭐️ ★★★½ The four Musketeers is definitely the brain, and maybe even the heart . the intrigues deepen, the affairs of the heart take center stage . it works well as a companion piece . 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-four-musketeers/ #FilmReview
